ab.style: margin-top: 0.0833in; font-weight: bold; hyphenate: false; font-size: 12pt; break-before: page;

div.p:
S80/11749, unit 1193, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria
MS written by G. Luehmann and signed by M.
To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the month
Quarter struck through and month added above.
ending 30thNovember 1 880.
7
overwritten by 8.

note.p:
Quarter struck through and month added
below.
